update.description:
Reorder installation instructions:

* Split the install tutorials into [separate tutorials under the same category](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=installation&branch=install_other_linux)
* Added instructions to [install gazebo on Debian, Fedora and Arch](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_other_linux&branch=install_other_linux)
* Keep the current URL working (tut=install) but [create a redirection page for latest version](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install&branch=install_other_linux)
update.title: Refactor install instructions

content.raw:
I think there are a few tutorials with references to the old category:

* install_from_source/tutorial_4-0.md
* install_old_versions/tutorial_2-2.md
* install_old_versions/tutorial_3-0.md
